comments:
I20060124-1115

NPE after 'Remove Un-Pinned Synchronizations' in Synchronize view

While having a project diff in the Synchronize view I first clicked on the 'Synchronize CVS' button and then selected 'Remove Un-Pinned Synchronizations' from the view menu.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2006-01-25 10:09:01.385
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Synchronizing CVS Compare 'v20060123' (/org.eclipse.platform.doc.isv)".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ui.synchronize.RefreshParticipantJob.run(RefreshParticipantJob.java:358)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 125043 ***
